channel.title: They Might Be Saints Ven. Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory O. Carm
channel.desc: Mary Angeline Teresa McCrory?s life of holiness and service to the elderly poor has led to a groundswell of support for sainthood. Michael O?Neill looks at Mother McCrory's legacy and the miracles attributed to her. (30 minutes).
